properties.description: Warm welcome, cup of tea, conversation, with speakers and activities.

hours._text: The Open Doors group offer a warm welcome on Mondays between 10am – 12.30pm .

properties.title: 3 Villages Community Hall

properties.description: The Craft and Chat Group continues to run every Wednesday afternoon from 1pm until 2.30pm. It runs all year round, with the exception of the first two weeks in January when they generally take a break. However, if there is a need to keep the Church open for these two Wednesday's, it could be arranged.
properties.title: Arrochar Parish Church

properties.description: A warm space, hot meal and free internet access, open to all the Lochgoil community.
properties.title: Lochgoilhead Village Hall
